com.example.colibris.multi.hypergraph

Class HyperEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.colibris.multi.hypergraph.HyperEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<HyperEdge>

    public class HyperEdge
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<HyperEdge>
    An (directed) Hyperedge correspond to a set of inneredges All theses ineredges have the same source

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(@NonNull

        Compare the weight of the given hyper egde
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<HyperEdge>
        Parameters:
